Reviews.Title: “Not for the faint hearted!!”
Reviews.Author: Mrs_Ramjam
Reviews.Content: stayed short notice won tickets gig fork loads money stay zone 1 paid £35 night hotel basic wasnt expecting lot expect pretty grim didnt sleep wink night foyer horrible stairs hallways horrible shabby ok fussy squeamish dirt mould oh window didnt shut wasnt necessarily disappointed estimated ability deal grime factor eddie richies bedsit series bottom skipped breakfast scared gig hammersmith apollo finished late black cab home hotels thinking staying road strolled home plus saved alot money gross deal cheap stay london drink

Reviews.Title: “Okay, for the price”
Reviews.Author: Paul W
Reviews.Content: wasnt expecting earth price paid hotel sleep price paid cant complain hotel service shabby holes walls loose shelves bathroom etc clean functional staff friendly helpful looking sleep hotels little bit wary credit card details copied onto authorisation form faxed else processed issues car parking available charge street parking free weekends overall pay

Reviews.Title: “everthing fine”
Reviews.Author: Andcob
Reviews.Content: stayed news eve bargain £60 twin plus breakfastroom clean modern hot water shower photo id explained carry location hammersmith value money location

Reviews.Title: “worst hotel ever, absoloutly filthy it should be closed down”
Reviews.Author: lee r
Reviews.Content: dont bother calling availability ben worst hotel slept 15 tradesman home initialy booked 2 nights via late night struggling entering building laminate floor filthy benefit doubt tv didnt neither toilet flush boxing toilet held tape wood guess urine carpet cig burns dirty complain receptionist started talk asian friend started laugh tv fixed 2 weeks staying 2 nights 10 outside window garden grass growing trimmings thrown windows roof top below morning woke red bug trying ear tried money check wouldnt return money walked claim visa money sent booked premier inn road breakfast forget ran door bags please self favour dont spend night regret

Reviews.Title: “no problems at all.”
Reviews.Author: pigofhappiness
Reviews.Content: friend stayed whilst hammersmith apollo stayed 2 nights look little tired couldnt complain paid 2 nights day base lots 2 mins found staff friendly clean downside lack pillows happy provide continental breakfast ample tea toast cereal fruit definitely stay 5 paying prices relation bad

Reviews.Title: “Stinking stig of a dump!!!”
Reviews.Author: emma l
Reviews.Content: hotel stinking disgrace total waste money arrived reception told leave car keys policy incase move car stairways smelly black scuff marks toilet flush nails sticking bath sockets hanging wall wardrobe leaning tower pisa chunk floor curtains held 2 hooks beds minging stains springs dug totally closing doing time

Reviews.Title: “awful never going back”
Reviews.Author: gemma12Lancashire
Reviews.Content: london concert booked hotel arrived couldnt 2 bin bags smelling rubbish carpet coverd bit crap door holes filled pillows bed lights switches hanging wall dangerous nails sticking bath curtains hanging crusty stains top sheet fag burns smoke alarms wardrobe tilting badly didnt touch hairdryer didnt neither shower wash hair tap huge chunks missing floor bed actually springs sticking top filthy pay cheap money dont surley passes health safety beyond

Reviews.Title: “Rubbish do not book”
Reviews.Author: Emma2103
Reviews.Content: arrival wasnt actually classed hotel bb hostel bad arrival receptionist complaining company customers customer service reception available honest alot updating character lounge actually squeeky divan bed pointless main matress feel bed telly looked 1950s wardrobe metal rack bathroom tiny dirty definatly serious didnt bother breakfast due else feel uncomfortable

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY HERE!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: CHRISP1980
Reviews.Content: stay doesnt cover hotel horrible stayed 217 basic understatement holes wall lights 1 tiny window ventalation stay hot uncomfortable wardrobe doors hanging tv didnt hair dryer didnt attempt eat called breakfast outside hotel looked bulding site payed £50 nite 2 nite stay rip stay hotel disapointed

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: JOHNOSCOT
Reviews.Content: please note reviews minging bargain haha honestly crying outside building holes ceiling plug sockets hanging walls hairdryer red tried hazard looks murder hallway marks walls breakfast poor cleanliness poor premises aware booking

Reviews.Title: “Don't be misled - Read on!”
Reviews.Author: Lord_Williams
Reviews.Content: stay premier west hotel monthly stayed week 1st feb 2011 london cheap proximity hammersmith tube station etc absolutely ideal am pleased worst reviews hotel site time gratifying increase bad comments am lone male traveller aged 53 clean bed nights sleep yes run bit tlc nice decor plush fittings pay extra stay else dont stay £40 expect ritz whine cheap price clean bed fine continue stay booked march stay

Reviews.Title: “NOT THAT BAD REALLY!”
Reviews.Author: Sjursaether
Reviews.Content: stayed 214 5 nights didnt bad negative experience hotel scared reading comments page location hotel awesome 4 minutes walk hammersmith tube smell lobby bit smell hallways stairs dreaded bit im person sleep bed ok sleep didnt sheet sleep blanket dont washed stay heating floor warm window bit uncomfy liveable bathroom shower clean didnt television looked bit cheap wrong hotel okay dont scared comments atleast 214 fine

Reviews.Title: “Aweful and unsafe. Recommand if your a student on the town but not familes!”
Reviews.Author: bunny2528
Reviews.Content: partner stayed hotel night close earls court am disabled wheelchair user stated instructions ramp stairs access eventually abe inside reception smelt terrible rotten feet blankets washing floor hall placed office wheel chair fit forced crutches short distances bed low floor struggled single sheets double bed tv indoor ariel watch exposed wires tv terrible nother blanket cold simply flat sheet thats mattress thick infact mattress topper proper mattress sleeping uncomfortable noisy desent bathroom looked lovely shame rest breakfast ok clean enjoy breakfast stale found bad practice payment method claimed card machine wrote partners card details form sister hotel worried extremely security code card photocopy form action account straight police hotel prob ok sleep seriously recommend

Reviews.Title: “HORRIBLE SMELLY AND DIRTY”
Reviews.Author: JayneyDidcot
Reviews.Content: booked hotel reading reviews wished read hotel shabby reception smelt stale directed worse hallway filthy gobsmacked shabby shower filthy smell else stuck didnt time book else sheets clean blanket quilt curtains didnt look washed carpet minging wouldnt recommend hotel cheap worth paying tried watch tv portable indoor ariel picture awful worse hotel stayed

Reviews.Title: “Marginally better than sleeping in your car”
Reviews.Author: UkTravellerOnTour
Reviews.Content: firstly arrival wrote card details including security onto piece paper trust security details am changing card pay cash impression faulty towers booked minute beggars cant choosers glad stayed night located transport links road outside potential noisy night tolerable overlooked relatively cheap retrospect false economy single cramped slept worse bed lumps looked grubby check bed frame bed bugs none found shower cold water adjusted controls run ages change 7am unreasonable expect hot water freezing shower following day ill related breakfast starts 730 youre youre hungry spent little time stay else unless desperate

Reviews.Title: “filthy disgusting excuse for a hotel”
Reviews.Author: attilla71
Reviews.Content: stayed 8 nights wish read reviews wat joke booked double single beds double mattress stuffed springs coming massive sink hole decided leave money stay hotel cleaners dirty rude hell dont job toilet paper days 4 times hotel smelly mould literally falling apart

Reviews.Title: “Yuk yuk yuk yuk yuk!!! Do NOT stay here!”
Reviews.Author: sambog
Reviews.Content: recommend hotel wish researched bit premier inn street booking thank god booked online usually £85 night double £55 arrival looked pretty lovely pubs close hammersmith tube station hotel looked run welcoming staff alright finding stairways narrow badly lit tired paint peeling walls broken floor tiles bathroomand squashed fly bed strange splatter ceiling attempt modern shower unit bit contemporary light fittings stark light oh terrible applying flat screen tv cover hole wall curtains awful hung properly tied pole string bed low comfy pillow provided towels provided walls thin hear people walking kitchenette unnecessary money spent please waste money hotel wasnt expecting brilliant london budget previous visits hotels available price stick premier inn travel lodge future youre getting

Reviews.Title: “Fine if you want a cheap hotel near the Apollo”
Reviews.Author: happyholidayer0
Reviews.Content: reading reviews hotel lot exageration budget hotel reminded travelers hotel europe cheapwe paid £40 night price centre london dont expect luxury roomthe basic didnt mould dirt cleaned daily tea coffee facilities microwave fridge kitchen sink dont didnt expect ours bathroom fine bed fine location excellent apollo 5 mins little pub door tube station 5 mins hammersmith nice round pubs nice hotel expected grab sleep apollo

Reviews.Title: “Hotel from HELL ! Dirty,Smelly,Falling to bits DON'T DO IT”
Reviews.Author: Tom6016
Reviews.Content: booked hotel read reviews site pay bed night bad answer bad patches carpet mold bathroom disgusting smell coming bathroom possibly pipe taped floor tap top fell grainy channels tv spray paint pile rubbish including food waste outside picture spend bit dont spend night life hotel pains call proximity apollo

Reviews.Title: “An Extremely Poor Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Amelia_A_87
Reviews.Content: arrived premier west hotel shocked shabby reception eg wires hanging walls tell victim halfhearted poor quality upgrading smell hotel reception unhelpful happy informed reference email correct offered solution partner log onto emails lobby computer front email found suspicious unnerving directed eventually found difficulty using key card enter especially advised neither seen entire desperate redecorate consisted broken curtain wardrobe broken door resting entire base wardrobe bit 2x4 drains bathroom blocked badly stunk shower covered mould sink wouldnt drain bed clean except slightly suspicious hairs possibly uncomfortable bed slept breakfast choice consisted toast cornflakes apple orange juice tea coffee basic lady serving unhelpful feel akward simply inconvience left standing waiting five minutes invited help ourselves day breakfast miss cant explain poor hotel people pride simply horrible

Reviews.Title: “What is all the fuss about? This hotel is fab!!”
Reviews.Author: jos7569
Reviews.Content: stayed 1 night london marathon read dreadful reviews dreading staying hotel suprised clean basement corridor leading stifling hot stayed worse hotels paid lot money price found decent hotel stay breakfast start till 8am left 7am london hotel 5 minutes walk

Reviews.Title: “Impolite receptionist”
Reviews.Author: aromart
Reviews.Content: arrival receptionist rude unhelpful parking provided £1000 charge daythere lift help offered carry bags flight stairs found card key difficult sink draining properlythe overall cleanliness poor

Reviews.Title: “shocking- think i was secretly filmed!”
Reviews.Author: emily_darlington
Reviews.Content: hotel staying staff overbooked charged booking fee stay offered money smelly dangerous creepy words describe understatement tampered walk cheap location please stay
